sentences.sContent: But thrumming underneath it is a deep layer of culinary funkreminiscent of fermentation.
sentences.sContent_eng: But thrumming underneath it is a deep layer of culinary funkreminiscent of fermentation.
sentences.sCn: 但敲打底部是深一层的使人想起的厨房的恐怖的发酵。

sentences.sContent: At that time, any fish caught had to be preserved. The only method possible was by fermentation.
sentences.sContent_eng: At that time, any fish caught had to be preserved. The only method possible was by fermentation.
sentences.sCn: 在那个年代，所有捕来的鱼都要被贮存起来，唯一可能的贮存方法就是发酵。

sentences.sContent: In the process of soybean milk and fermentation, soybean beany flavor is described by the unpleasant smelling consisted of the acerbity, bitter and grass - smelling component.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the process of soybean milk and fermentation, soybean beany flavor is described by the unpleasant smelling consisted of the acerbity, bitter and grass - smelling component.
sentences.sCn: 摘要在豆乳或发酵豆乳的加工中，大豆涩味、苦味和青草味成分物质所构成的不良异味，被人们描述为大豆腥味。

phrases.pCn: 发酵技术，发酵工艺；发酵工程
需氧发酵；好气发酵；需气发酵
